data.comment: Today's referee, Sascha Stegemann, has blown to start the match.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Stuttgart.
In the minute 2, Stuttgart awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sascha Stegemann awards Stuttgart a goal kick.
Free kick Union Berlin.
In the minute 3, Konstantinos Mavropanos (Stuttgart) has received a first yellow card.
Goal! Union Berlin take a 0-1 lead through a well-placed header from Marvin Friedrich.
Sascha Stegemann awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 6, Free kick for Stuttgart in their own half.
Union Berlin's Marvin Friedrich gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Stuttgart at Mercedes Benz Arena.
In the minute 8, Corner awarded to Union Berlin.
Throw-in for Union Berlin in the half of Stuttgart.
Throw-in for Stuttgart at Mercedes Benz Arena.
In the minute 13, Stuttgart have been awarded a corner by Sascha Stegemann.
Stuttgart push upfield and Konstantinos Mavropanos gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Union Berlin defence.
Throw-in Stuttgart.
In the minute 14, Stuttgart pushes forward through Silas Wamangituka, whose finish on goal is saved.
Free kick for Union Berlin in the half of Stuttgart.
Union Berlin to take a throw-in in Stuttgart territory.
In the minute 16, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Nicolas Gonzalez for Stuttgart gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Sascha Stegemann signals a free kick to Stuttgart in their own half.
In the minute 17, Ball goes out of play for a Union Berlin goal kick.
Stuttgart awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Stuttgart get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Union Berlin's half?
In the minute 20, Ball safe as Union Berlin is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Union Berlin's Sheraldo Becker gets in a shot on goal at Mercedes Benz Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Union Berlin's Sheraldo Becker is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 26, Throw-in for Union Berlin in their own half.
Sascha Stegemann signals a Union Berlin throw-in in Stuttgart's half.
Stuttgart's Nicolas Gonzalez misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 27, Union Berlin have a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Stuttgart goal kick.
Stuttgart have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 29, Sascha Stegemann signals a free kick to Stuttgart.
Goal kick for Union Berlin at Mercedes Benz Arena.
Sascha Stegemann signals a free kick to Union Berlin in their own half.
In the minute 31, Mateo Klimowicz for Stuttgart has been booked by Sascha Stegemann and receives a first yellow card.
Union Berlin to take a throw-in in Stuttgart territory.
Stuttgart awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 34, Stuttgart awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Sascha Stegemann signals a Stuttgart throw-in in Union Berlin's half.
In Stuttgart a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 35, Union Berlin's Grischa Promel has been booked in Stuttgart.
Throw-in for Union Berlin in their own half.
Throw-in for Stuttgart at Mercedes Benz Arena.
In the minute 38, Free kick for Union Berlin in their own half.
Stuttgart have a goal kick.
Union Berlin awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 40, Ball safe as Union Berlin is awarded a throw-in in their half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Stuttgart.
Union Berlin have been awarded a corner by Sascha Stegemann.
In the minute 43, Cedric Teuchert of Union Berlin gets in a strike, but is off target.
Sascha Stegemann awards Stuttgart a goal kick.
Sascha Stegemann awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 44, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Union Berlin.
The first-half is over at Mercedes Benz Arena.
In the minute 46, The second half has started at Mercedes Benz Arena.
In the minute 46, Throw-in for Union Berlin in their own half.
Daniel Didavi is replacing Mateo Klimowicz for Stuttgart at Mercedes Benz Arena.
Pellegrino Matarazzo (Stuttgart) is making a second substitution, with Tanguy Coulibaly replacing Borna Sosa.
Great shot from Stuttgart's Nicolas Gonzalez but he is denied by the crossbar.
Free kick for Stuttgart in the half of Union Berlin.
In the minute 49, In Stuttgart a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In Stuttgart, Union Berlin push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Union Berlin attack but Grischa Promel's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 50, Stuttgart have a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Stuttgart goal kick.
Goal kick for Union Berlin at Mercedes Benz Arena.
In the minute 52, Free kick Union Berlin.
Free kick for Stuttgart in their own half.
Can Union Berlin get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Stuttgart's half?
In the minute 55, Sascha Stegemann signals a free kick to Stuttgart.
Sebastian Griesbeck (Union Berlin) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Nicolas Gonzalez is booked for the home team.
In the minute 56, The home team have replaced Konstantinos Mavropanos with Pascal Stenzel. This is the third substitution made today by Pellegrino Matarazzo.
In Stuttgart a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Sascha Stegemann awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 59, Sascha Stegemann signals a free kick to Union Berlin in their own half.
Corner awarded to Union Berlin.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Stuttgart.
In the minute 61, The away team have replaced Sheraldo Becker with Marius Bulter. This is the first substitution made today by Urs Fischer.
Throw-in for Stuttgart in the half of Union Berlin.
Throw-in for Stuttgart in the half of Union Berlin.
In the minute 65, Stuttgart push upfield but Sascha Stegemann quickly pulls them for offside.
Free kick for Union Berlin in the half of Stuttgart.
Union Berlin awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 68, The away team replace Cedric Teuchert with Julian Ryerson.
Throw-in for Stuttgart at Mercedes Benz Arena.
Sascha Stegemann signals a free kick to Stuttgart.
In the minute 72, Sascha Stegemann signals a free kick to Union Berlin in their own half.
Can Union Berlin get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Stuttgart's half?
Ball safe as Stuttgart is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 75, Nicolas Gonzalez of Stuttgart is pulled up for offside.
Tanguy Coulibaly for Stuttgart is whistled offside.
Goal! Union Berlin increase their lead to 0-2 through a well-placed header from Taiwo Awoniyi.
In the minute 78, Can Union Berlin capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Stuttgart's half?
Sascha Stegemann awards Stuttgart a goal kick.
Throw-in Stuttgart.
In the minute 79, Union Berlin needs to be cautious. Stuttgart have an attacking throw-in.
Sascha Stegemann blows against Stuttgart's Tanguy Coulibaly for offside.
Pellegrino Matarazzo (Stuttgart) is making a fifth substitution, with Sasa Kalajdzic replacing Marc Kempf.
In the minute 81, Free kick Union Berlin.
Ball goes out of play for a Stuttgart goal kick.
Union Berlin are whistled for offside.
In the minute 85, Corner awarded to Stuttgart.
Sasa Kalajdzic keeps Stuttgartâ€™s hopes alive with a headed strike to make it 1-2.
That's a fine assist from Philipp Klement.
In the minute 86, Free kick for Stuttgart in their own half.
Union Berlin awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Union Berlin awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 87, Akaki Gogia is on a sub for Sebastian Griesbeck for Union Berlin.
Sascha Stegemann awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Stuttgart is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 89, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Stuttgart in their own half.
Sascha Stegemann signals a free kick to Union Berlin in their own half.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Union Berlin awarded a free kick in their own half.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-2.
Goal! The home team draw level at 2-2 through Sasa Kalajdzic.
Akaki Gogia (Union Berlin) gets a yellow card.
